text: Lepisosteus is a genus of gars in the family Lepisosteidae only known across North America. == Species == The currently recognized species are: * Lepisosteus oculatus Winchell, 1864 (Spotted gar) * Lepisosteus osseus Linnaeus, 1758 (Longnose gar) * Lepisosteus platysomus Rafinesque, 1820 (Shortnose gar) * Lepisosteus platyrhincus DeKay, 1842 (Florida gar) == Related pages == * Atractosteus == References == # "Lepisosteidae" (PDF). Deeplyfish- fishes of the world. Retrieved 18 May 2017. # "Class Osteichthyes," in Estes and Berberian, 1970, p.3 Taxon identifiers * Wikidata: Q133479 * Wikispecies: Lepisosteus * ADW: Lepisosteus Category:Gars
title: Lepisosteus
